ai-sn3:25.1.3_0: “So, great king, where are you coming from in the middle of the day?”
ai-sn3:25.1.4_0: “Sir, there are anointed aristocratic kings who are infatuated with authority, and obsessed with greed for sensual pleasures. They have attained stability in the country, occupying a vast conquered territory. Today I have been busy fulfilling the duties of such kings.”
ai-sn3:25.2.1_0: What do you think, great king?
ai-sn3:25.2.2_0: Suppose a trustworthy and reliable man were to come from the east.
ai-sn3:25.2.3_0: He’d approach you and say the same thing.
ai-sn3:25.2.4_0: ‘Please sir, you should know this. I come from the east.
ai-sn3:25.2.5_0: There I saw a huge mountain that reached the clouds. And it was coming this way, crushing all creatures.
ai-sn3:25.2.6_0: So then, great king, do what you must!’
ai-sn3:25.2.7_0: Then a second trustworthy and reliable man were to come from the west ...
ai-sn3:25.2.9_0: and a fourth from the south.
ai-sn3:25.2.10_0: He’d approach you and say the same thing.

ai-sn3:25.3.1_0: “Sir, I would have experiential confidence in the Buddha evening you.”
